credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Colonnade with fountain
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, graphite on paper
description: A sketch left in pencil on the left, and filled in with ink and wash on the right. A wall with niches and colonnades contains a fountain with a figure of a man upon a rock in the center, a figure on a console standing at the projecting wall, and a niche with a sculpture upon a pedestal with steps below.
name: Drawing
